reviews.review: Excelente, o melhor FPS já criado !
Muito bom o jogo para jogar com todos os amigos.
It Good, It bad. But mostly, It good.
El mejor FPS en mi opinión.

I regret buying this, I bought this before it went F2P. I used to enjoy this game back in the 2012 and 2013 days on my brother's old steam account, the game now hasn't been the same. Gambling, trolls, smurfs, cheaters, and lootboxes ruined this game. Btw I'm bad at this game, I tried my best to get good, and I got kicked multiple times lol. So yea, I decided to quit cuz I'm tired of this game, I'm moving on with other games. Coming back to Counter Stike is a mistake.
it gud, shooty game gun fun
Fun FPS shooting game, allows me to relieve my stress except for very toxic polayers
Melhor jogo FPS que joguei, pena que existe pessoas sem celebro que usa cheat e estraga o divertimento de quem ama o game.

Counter Strike is Counter Strike. It's fun at times, aggravating at others, and is about as straightforward of a "kill the bad guys" game as you can get.

It's also free to play now.... I guess that's good to some degree? Just be aware that free-to-play users are generally kept separate from paid players in matches, so if you're a guy who got the game for $0, you'll be playing with some rather low-quality fodder.
Muito da hora o game, porem só da pra jogar a grande maioria das vezes partidas competitivas que nao tenha hack em modo prime.:(
u know what this is for

Ебнутая параша от Valve, иногда весело, а иногда охото разъебать пк об стену, потому что либо нуботима, либо пули летят куда угодно(на Север, на Юг, в тебя обратно и тд) - но только не в противника, который выходит на префе и случайно даёт тебе в жбан и пишет в чат - You Noob(ОРУ С ТАКИХ)
